ckanr
=====

```{r echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE, 
  message = FALSE
)
```

`ckanr` is an R client for the generic CKAN API - that is, plug in a base url for the CKAN instance of interest. 

## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sckott/ckanr")
```

```{r}
library('ckanr')
```
